pwiz::data::FrequencyData

pwiz::data::FrequencyData Class Reference

#include <FrequencyData.hpp>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Stores raw frequency-domain data, as well as meta-data.

Also includes basic access and analysis functions.

Definition at line 47 of file FrequencyData.hpp.
